## WidgetDiv namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createDom()](./blockly.widgetdiv.createdom.md) | Create the widget div and inject it onto the page. |
|  [getDiv()](./blockly.widgetdiv.getdiv.md) | Returns the HTML container for editor widgets. |
|  [hide()](./blockly.widgetdiv.hide.md) | Destroy the widget and hide the div. |
|  [hideIfOwner(oldOwner)](./blockly.widgetdiv.hideifowner.md) | Destroy the widget and hide the div if it is being used by the specified object. |
|  [hideIfOwnerIsInWorkspace(workspace)](./blockly.widgetdiv.hideifownerisinworkspace.md) | Destroy the widget and hide the div if it is being used by an object in the specified workspace, or if it is used by an unknown workspace. |
|  [isVisible()](./blockly.widgetdiv.isvisible.md) | Is the container visible? |
|  [repositionForWindowResize()](./blockly.widgetdiv.repositionforwindowresize.md) | Reposition the widget div if the owner of it says to. If the owner isn't a field, just give up and hide it. |
|  [show(newOwner, rtl, newDispose, workspace, manageEphemeralFocus)](./blockly.widgetdiv.show.md) | Initialize and display the widget div. Close the old one if needed. |
